name: China First Capital, Ltd
tag_list: private-equity, venture-capital, china, asia, china-private-equity, china-venture-capital
overview:
China First Capital is among the leading China-focused specialist investment banks for private capital markets and M&A transactions in China.

CFC primarily serves China’s high-growth private entrepreneur-led companies through private equity fundraisings and strategic M&A, domestic and cross-border. Transaction volume over preceding 12 months exceeds $250mn. CFC’s geographical reach is across all regions of China. It has significant domain expertise in most major industries in China’s private sector. CFC produces proprietary research (English and Chinese language) on the structure and performance of China’s private sector economy and capital markets.

CFC is a source of quality deal flow for top tier private equity firms in China, both renminbi and dollar funds, as well as strategic corporate acquirers (both foreign and China-domestic) seeking to expand in China.
